title: ProfileEvent
description: Structure holding information about a ProfileEvent

start.description: The profile start time in ISO 8601 UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')

end.description: The profile end time in ISO 8601 UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')

family.description: Profile family used by the backend to identify the profile type. For Perfetto, use "android".

version.description: Schema version of the event, only `4` is supported

tags_profiler.description: The list of tags joined into a String and divided by ','

application.description: The RUM Application this profile event is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier of RUM Application in the UUID format.

session.description: The RUM Session this profile event is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier of RUM Session in the UUID format.

view.description: The RUM View this profile event is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier in the UUID format.

vital.description: The RUM Vital this profile event is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier of RUM Vital in the UUID format.
